definition: bend in a street/corner/to turn a corner
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
angle of drift (navigation)/deflection (from course)/angle of divergence

sentences.english: She was asked by her mother to go to buy apples at the greengrocer's at the corner.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲要她到转角的蔬菜店去买些苹果回来。

sentences.english: A moment when the road bends.
sentences.chinese: 在道路转角的那一刹难。

sentences.english: There was a restaurant at the corner.
sentences.chinese: 街道转角处有一家餐厅。

sentences.english: Optional X-coordinate of the top-left corner of the texture region to lock.
sentences.chinese: 可选择用于锁定纹理区域的转角左顶点X坐标。

sentences.english: And now the final step of this process is to round the corners of the foreground images.
sentences.chinese: 现在到了本阶段的最后一步，圆滑背景中图像的转角。

sentences.english: Once the final passage across the banks agreed in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 曾经的商定终极流逝在隔岸的转角。

sentences.english: The road makes a sharp descent just around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 那条路在转角处造成一陡峻的斜坡。

sentences.english: The effects of different frequencies and rolling angles on the aerodynamic characteristics are also compared.
sentences.chinese: 比较了在不同频率和滚转角下乘波飞行器的气动特性。

sentences.english: The bus stop is on that corner.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车站在那个转角处。

sentences.english: On the upper storey, a master suite with a glazed corner projects out over the poolside terrace.
sentences.chinese: 在上层，主人套房有一个玻璃转角，向池畔露台伸出。

sentences.english: Go straight down this street until you reach the corner, and then turn right.
sentences.chinese: 沿路向前走直到转角处，然后右转。

sentences.english: So they always sit in the corner, waiting for the love of the.
sentences.chinese: 所以她们总是坐在转角处，等待着爱人的经过。

sentences.english: Behind the angle formed by the two streets, a man was standing erect against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 在转角的地方，有个人靠墙立着。

sentences.english: The building's raking corners offer the opportunity for funiculars to transport the public ertically up the building.
sentences.chinese: 在建筑倾斜的转角处提供竖向运输的可能。

sentences.english: There was too much gravel on that corner. I slid out.
sentences.chinese: 转角有太多碎石，我就滑倒了。

definition: to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
head of a flight of stairs
